loginDescription: Shyiramo umwirondoro wawe kugira ngo ubashe kwinjira.
passMarkDescription: Iri nota (50) rikoreshwa hose muri sisitemu mu kumenya niba umunyeshuri yatsinze cyangwa yatsinzwe mu manota no mu mapayi.
themeDescription: Uburyo bwijimye bushobora guhindurwa hakoreshejwe akabuto k'izuba/ukwezi mu mutwe wa porogaramu.
notificationsDescription: Imenyesha rya email ku bikorwa bya sisitemu riteganyijwe mu minsi iri imbere kandi ntiriraboneka ubu.
advancedFeaturesTitle: Ibyiza by'Iterambere & Ibyongeweho mu Gihe Kizaza
advancedFeaturesDescription: Ibyiza by'Iterambere nko kohereza amakuru muri PDF/Excel ku mapayi yose, igenamiterere rirambuye ry'amapayi, n'igenamiterere ry'itumanaho (urugero: SMS/email) biteganyijwe mu minsi iri imbere ya Report-Manager Lite. Amahitamo ahari "Kohereza muri CSV" atanga uburyo bw'ibanze bwo gukuramo amakuru.
noPermissionSystemSettings: Ntabwo ufite uburenganzira bwo guhindura igenamiterere rya sisitemu.
languageSettingsDescription: Hitamo ururimi ukunda rugaragara muri porogaramu.
homePagePurpose: Kora neza amanota y'abanyeshuri, kora raporo, kandi woroshye imiyoborere y'ishuri.
homePageFeature1Desc: Imbonerahamwe zihariye ku Ba-Admin, Abarimu, n'Abanyamabanga.
homePageFeature2Desc: Kwinjiza amanota byoroshye, kubara mu buryo bwikora, n'amapayi arambuye.
homePageFeature3Desc: Kora raporo z'umusaruro ku munyeshuri, ishuri, n'isomo.
